mapper.select: select distinct e.menu_id, e.menu_name, e.menu_link, e.sortno from sys_user a, sys_user_role b, sys_role c, sys_role_menu d, sys_menu e where a.user_id = b.user_id and b.role_id = c.role_id and c.role_id = d.role_id and d.menu_id = e.menu_id and e.menu_lv = '1' and a.user_name = #{userName} and e.is_enable = '1' order by e.sortno asc

select distinct e.menu_id, e.menu_upid, e.menu_name, e.menu_link, e.menu_lv, e.is_enable, e.menu_st, e.menu_img, e.menu_remark, e.sortno from sys_user a, sys_user_role b, sys_role c, sys_role_menu d, sys_menu e where a.user_id = b.user_id and b.role_id = c.role_id and c.role_id = d.role_id and d.menu_id = e.menu_id and e.is_enable = '1' and a.user_id = #{userId} and e.menu_upid = #{topMenuId} order by e.sortno asc

select a.USER_ID, a.DEPT_ID, a.USER_NAME, a.USER_PWD, a.USER_REAL, a.USER_SEX, a.USER_BIRTHDAY, a.USER_CARDNO, a.USER_PHONE, a.USER_MPHONE, a.USER_IP, a.USER_ALIAS, b.CHANNEL_NAME from SYS_USER a, USER_CHANNEL b where a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID(+) and a.USER_NAME = #{userName} and rownum = 1
